name: SaniyaIrfan/SanDigEd.github.io
desc: My name is Saniya Irfan. I'm a first year PhD scholar at IIT Delhi, New Delhi. This is my sample work in Text Encoding Initiative. The texts encoded here, namely, English translations of Mirza Ghalib's diary written in 1857 and Fahmida Riaz's poems, and a famous Urdu Marsiya.
